name: Toolnich The Game DEMO
description:
- Attention !!!

The exe file / program does not contain a confirmation or an official publisher (because it is an indie game) so there is a chance that the program will be seen as windows, unknown or dangerous, please (if you want to play the game) select the option "run anyway" in "more info" !!!!!!
The game is translated from Romanian!

- Toolnich the Game!

A big project, made by a small group of people!
This is a story RPG ... where you can make your own choices and your own ending!
I know you've probably seen this kind of game before, but the difference is that here are different mechanics and a completely different story!
Are you ready to discover your own story?
Not only that but also the story of the location and the Toolnich project?
Unfortunately you will have to wait until you discover this wonderful world because the full game is not done in its entirety!
This is a demo and unfortunately you can only explore a small part of the beginning of the story, but don't panic, you can still meet some characters with a unique personality and you can see the future mechanics that the game offers you!
Story:
Simple! You have been invited to an unknown location in the village of Toolnich, a location where many secrets and of course friends are waiting for you, where you and the rest of the people must revive the location and bring it back to life!
Of course you are not obliged to follow the story ... at least not the last part! Let's just say the characters will see your story ... and not you ... because you're aware of your own actions, right?
But of course ... please discover the game and see what it will look like in this demo!
